en-US: Welcome to Freestyle Ranch, I've got some crops that need water, and don't let them critters\neat anything!
Come on on up to the barn, and get your equipment
Swap 'em out as you need them, and don't let those criters EAT ANYTHING!

How To Play:
[Esc] - Open Menu (while in game)
[A/D] - Control the Mech Legs' direction
[W/S] - Control the Mech's throttle
[Space] - Full stop the throttle
[Left Click] - Fire Weapon 1
[Right Click] - Fire Weapon 2
Pickup Equipment from the Barn
Protect the crops -WIP
Left click to place in left hardpoint,\nRight click the place in right hardpoint
